Module io.winterframework.mod.web
Package io.winterframework.mod.web

Interface WebRoute<A extends WebExchange>

Type Parameters:
A - the type of web exchange handled by the route
All Superinterfaces:
AcceptAwareRoute<A>, ContentAwareRoute<A>, MethodAwareRoute<A>, PathAwareRoute<A>, Route<A>
public interface WebRoute<A extends WebExchange> extends PathAwareRoute<A>, MethodAwareRoute<A>, ContentAwareRoute<A>, AcceptAwareRoute<A>, Route<A>

A web route specifies criteria used to determine the web exchange handler to execute to handle a request.

It basically supports the following criteria:

  • the path to the resource which can be parameterized as defined by URIBuilder.
  • the HTTP method used to access the resource
  • the media range defining the content types accepted by the resource as defined by RFC 7231 Section 5.3.2.
  • the content type of the resource
  • the language tag of the resource
Since:
1.0
Author:
Jeremy Kuhn
See Also:
WebExchange, WebRouter
